review: I had a problem setting it up on my laptop. It came up with a screen that said my browser was not compatible even when I downloaded the Google browser to set it up. Luckly I had an app on my iPad to set it up. While streaming Netflix through either my iPad or iPhone i had trouble with the casting button staying on Netflix. I could start my movie, but ten minutes later I would go to pause it and the casting button was gone. I couldn't pause the show or do anything. Having to completely close out of the netflix app on my iOS and go back into the app it would come back so I could stop it. Then I tried using it on my Samsung tablet and had no problem loosing the cast button, and it worked very good with this tablet with the android system. So all together it wouldn't work good with my iOS, but worked great with my android.

review: Simple, easy to use and really works great. I have apple TV and Roku and normally end up using the Chromecast most of the time. I watch HD streaming videos from my phone all the time.
